movies.title: The Towering Inferno
movies.plot: Doug Roberts, Architect, returns from a long vacation to find work nearly completed on his skyscraper. He goes to the party that night concerned he's found that his wiring specifications have not been followed and that the building continues to develop short circuits. When the fire begins, Michael O'Halleran is the chief on duty as a series of daring rescues punctuate the terror of a building too tall to have a fire successfully fought from the ground.

events.title: the tallest building in the world starts burning

movies.title: The Missiles of October
movies.plot: In October 1962, the Kennedy administration struggles to contain the Cuban Missile Crisis.
movies.awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 win & 8 nominations.

events.title: President Kennedy is shown images of the missiles
an agreement is made between John F. Kennedy and Nikita Khrushchev to end the stand-off

movies.title: Miracles Still Happen
movies.plot: A seventeen-year-old schoolgirl is the sole survivor of a plane crash in the Peruvian Amazon.
